llmDialog.title: Use External LLM Provider
llmDialog.description: You can choose a different provider for the game analysis. This requires your own API key for the respective service.
llmDialog.privacyDescription: Your API key is stored securely in your browser and is never sent to our servers. It is transmitted directly from your browser to the API of the provider you choose.
settings.title: LLM Settings
settings.findApiKeyLink: How to find your API key?
help.title: Help & Support
help.gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
help.gettingStarted.content:
Welcome to ChessTrax AI Coach! This application analyzes your lost chess games to identify patterns and create personalized improvement plans.

To get started:
1. Enter your Lichess username OR upload a PGN file
2. Click 'Create My Training Plan'
3. Wait for the AI analysis to complete
4. Review your personalized improvement recommendations

The analysis focuses on your recent losses to identify the most impactful areas for improvement.
help.lichessIntegration.title: Lichess Integration
help.lichessIntegration.content:
ChessTrax can automatically fetch your games from Lichess:

• Simply enter your Lichess username
• The system will fetch up to 2000 of your most recent games
• Only your lost games will be analyzed
• No login required - just your public username

Your Lichess profile must be public for this feature to work. If you prefer privacy, you can export games manually from Lichess and upload the PGN file instead.
help.pgnUpload.title: PGN File Upload
help.pgnUpload.content:
You can upload PGN files exported from Lichess or other platforms:

• Supported format: Standard PGN (.pgn files)
• Your username will be automatically detected
• Only your lost games will be analyzed
• Large files may take longer to process

To export from Lichess:
1. Go to your Lichess profile
2. Click 'Export games'
3. Download the PGN file
4. Upload it here
help.analysisResults.title: Understanding Your Analysis
help.analysisResults.content:
Your analysis report contains several key sections:

• Primary Focus: The most important area to work on first
• Opening Analysis: Specific openings to study or avoid
• Tactical Blind-Spots: Common tactical patterns you miss
• Strategic Weaknesses: Positional concepts to improve
• Endgame Training: Specific endgame types to practice

Each section includes practical recommendations and links to relevant training resources on Lichess.
help.troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
help.troubleshooting.content:
Common Issues:

• Username not found: Check spelling and ensure your Lichess profile is public
• No lost games found: Make sure you have recent losses in your game history
• Analysis failed: Try again in a few minutes - the AI service may be busy
• File upload issues: Ensure your PGN file is valid and under 10MB

If problems persist, try using your own API key for more reliable service.
help.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
help.faq.content:
Q: Is my data stored anywhere?
A: No, all analysis happens in your browser. Your games and API keys are never stored on our servers.

Q: How accurate is the analysis?
A: The AI provides educational insights based on your game patterns. It's not a substitute for a human coach but offers valuable improvement directions.

Q: Can I use my own AI API key?
A: Yes! You can use your own Google Gemini, OpenAI, Anthropic, or Grok API key for unlimited analyses.

Q: Why only lost games?
A: Analyzing losses is more effective for improvement as it highlights specific areas where you struggle.
help.footer: Need more help? Visit our GitHub repository for detailed documentation and community support.
about.title: About ChessTrax AI Coach
about.technicalInfo: Built with modern web technologies for fast, secure chess game analysis.
about.footer: ChessTrax AI Coach - Your personal path to chess improvement.
